widgets.onCreate:
setVar('this', 'alphaFill', 0.15)
setVar('this', 'isEnabled', false)
locals.longPressDelay = 500

locals.disable = function () {
  setVar('this', 'isEnabled', false)
  setVar('this', 'alphaFill', 0.15)
}
